website_summaries.verdict: Simple design, durable steel wrist roller that works with easily attachable 1-inch plates.
pros: Padded foam grip provides increased comfort and minimizes hand fatigue
Easily attach and use with standard 1-inch weights
Up to 100-pound weigh capacity, for building strength in grip and forearm
cons: Some purchasers found foam grip comes loose from metal bar when used with heavier weights

customer_reviews.title: Be CAREFUL!
customer_reviews.text: For light weight it is OK. When I loaded this with just 25lbs the eye on the hook bent, opened and dropped the weighs right next to my foot!
customer_reviews.author: Allergy reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. I would definitely reccomend
customer_reviews.text: It is great and does exactly what I need it to do. I have two minor complaints: 1) The material that the handles are made of causes an unwanted amount of friction and makes the rolling slightly more difficult. 2) The string is a bit long and therefore the bottom sits on the floor when the string is fully unraveled. However, I have tried out the authentic Wrist Ripper and, although it doesn't have these problems, it is definitely not worth paying 5x the price to get the authentic Wrist Ripper.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Very good forearm roller
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several forearm rolllers in the past, and I'm mostly happy with this one. Pros: 1) lightweight 2) durable 3) cable is sufficiently long. I'm 5'10" and can stand on a small platform for longer pulls. With most of the rollers I end up swapping out the cable for a longer one. 4) I've gone up to 30 pounds with no issue. Cons: 1) only complaint: One foam handle came off (otherwise I'd give 5 stars). The exposed metal however is fine for gripping though.
customer_reviews.author: Own McArthur

customer_reviews.title: Good exercise tool for the forearms / wrists

product_meta.title: Trademark Innovations Wrist and Forearm Roller Armblaster for Standard 1" Plates

Made with steel bar construction for added durability
